name: Heidi Miller
text: Always polite and courteous. Service is quick and pizzas are great. Our kids love Hungry Howies. I actually think it tastes better than papa johns or dominos. The flavored crusts are great too. Its like getting the flavored breadsticks attached to your pizza. Eat the pizza and then dip in the pizza sauce. Kids love it!

text: Amazing pizza but really you charge for 1 xtra marinara sauce when the sizes your give out for a regular Cajun bread is enough for literally two pieces ! Not happy withthe service tonight
